As with every operating system there are: हरेक सञ्चालन प्रणालीमा जस्तै, केही कुराहरु होलान् जससँग तपाईं परिचित नहुन सक्नुहुन्छ। यस खण्डले वेब ब्राउज गर्ने र संगीत सुन्ने जस्ता सरल, दैनिक कार्यहरू कसरी गर्ने भनी सिकाउनेछ, साथै अन्य उपयोगी जानकारीहरु दिनेछ जस बारे तपाईं अनभिज्ञ हुन सक्नुहुन्छ।
The elementary desktop is very simple an: elementary डेस्कटप धेरै सरल र सिक्न सजिलो छ। यसका दुई तत्वहरु हुन्छन्: प्यानल र डक। डेस्कटपको वालपेपर तपाईंले System Settings → Desktop → Wallpaper मा गएर फेर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।
At the top of the screen you can see the: स्क्रिनको माथिल्लो भागमा तपाईंले प्यानल देख्न सक्नुहुन्छ। यसमा बाँयापट्टि अनुप्रयोग मेनु छ, बीचमा समय र मिति छ, र दाँयापट्टि संकेतकहरु छन्।
On the left side of the panel is the App: प्यानलमा बाँयापट्टि अनुप्रयोग मेनु छ। Applications थिच्दा तपाईंका सबै स्थापना गरिएका अनुप्रयोगहरु सहितको एउटा लञ्चर देखापर्दछ। धेरै अनुपरायोगहरु भएर पृष्‍ठहरु भएको खण्डमा तपाईंले यिनलाई लञ्चरको तल्लो भागमा रहेको पृष्‍ठ संकेतक प्रयोग गरेर वा स्क्रल गरेर हेर्न सक्नुहुनेछ। तपाईंले अनुपरायोगहरुलाई योजनाबद्ध रुपमा अथवा श्रेणीबद्ध रुपमा हेर्न लञ्चरको माथिल्लो भागमा रहेको दृष्‍टिकोण परिवर्तक पनि प्रयोग गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ। अन्त्यमा, तपाईंले कुनै पनि समयमा लञ्चरमा टाईप गरेर अनुपरायोगहरुको खोजी गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।
On the right side of the panel are icons: प्यानलको दाँयापट्टि भएका चिन्हहरुलाई संकेतक भनिन्छ। यिनिहरुले तपाईंंको सेसनको हालको स्थितिका बारेमा संकेतहरु देखाउँदछन्, उदाहरणका लागि तपाईंंको नेटवर्क कनेक्शन, ब्याट्रीको शक्ति, समय, च्याट र इमेल खाताहरु, इत्यादी। कुनै पनि संकेतकलाई थिचेर थप जानकारी पाउन तथा सम्बन्धित कार्यहरु हेर्न सकिन्छ।
डक स्क्रिनको तल्लो भागमा अवस्थित हुन्छ। यसमा तपाईंंका मनपर्ने अनुप्रयोगहरु साथै हाल खुला अवस्थामा रहेका अरु अनुप्रयोगहरु रहन्छन्।
The contents of the dock are easily cust: डकमा रहेका अनुप्रयोगहरुलाई सजिलैसित फेरबदल गर्न सकिन्छ। डकमा कुनै अनुप्रयोग थप्नका लागि, त्यसलाई प्यानलमा अवस्थित Applications बाट तानेर डकमा खसाल्नुहोस् अथवा कुनै पनि खुल्ला अवस्थामा रहेको अनुप्रयोगको चिन्हमा दायाँ क्लिक गर्नुहोस् र सूचीबाट Keep in Dock छान्नुहोस्। डकबाट कुनै अनुप्रयोगलाई हटाउन त्यस अनुप्रयोगलाई डकबाट तानेर कुनै खाली ठाउँँ वा तपाईंंको डेस्कटपमा खसाल्नुहोस् अथवा त्यस अनुप्रयोगको चिन्हमा दायाँ क्लिक गर्नुहोस् र सूचीबाट Keep in Dock छानेर हटाउनुहोस्। डकमा अनुप्रयोगहरू पुनःव्यवस्थित गर्नका लागि, तिनिहरुलाई केवल तान्नुहोस् र खसाल्नुहोस्।
By default, the dock hides off the botto: जब कुनै अनुप्रयोगलाई ठुलो बनाइन्छ, पूर्वनिर्धारण गरिए जस्तै डक स्क्रिनको तल लुकेको हुन्छ। डकलाई देखिने बनाउन तपाईंंको माउसलाई स्क्रिनको तल्लो भागको केन्द्र तिर सार्नुहोस्।
You can customize the dock's behavior th: तपाईंंले डकको व्यवहारलाई System Settings → Desktop → Dock मा गएर परिवर्तन गर्न सक्नु हुनेछ।
App's exist in their own windows which c: अनुप्रयोगहरु आ-आफ्नै विन्डोहरुमा अवस्थित रहन्छन् जसलाई बन्द गर्न, ठुलो बनाउन, अथवा यताउती सार्न सकिन्छ।
When you open an app, its window appears: जब तपाईंंले कुनै अनुप्रयोग खोल्नुहुन्छ, त्यसको विन्डो डेस्कटपमा देखापर्दछ। हरेक अनुप्रयोगको सामान्यतया तीनवटा भागहरु हुन्छन्: विन्डोका बटनहरु, एउटा उपकरण पट्टी, र त्यस अनुप्रयोगका सामाग्रीहरु।
An app's window buttons are at the top c: An app's window buttons are at the top corners of the app window. The close button is on the left and the maximize button is on the right. Pressing the close button will close the app's window. Pressing the maximize button will toggle whether the app window takes up the full screen or not. You can move an app's window around the desktop by dragging empty space between the window buttons.
Many apps have a toolbar at the top of t: Many apps have a toolbar at the top of the app. This area contains common actions or navigation items for the app. You can move an app's window around by dragging any blank area of a toolbar.
elementary OS supports two types of mult: elementary OS supports two types of multitasking: windows and workspaces.
Apps open in app windows. They can overl: Apps open in app windows. They can overlap on your desktop and be moved around. You can switch between windows several ways:
click on the window you want to switch t: click on the window you want to switch to
click on the app's icon in the dock: click on the app's icon in the dock
To see an overview of your open app wind: To see an overview of your open app windows, press <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>W</kbd>.
You can customize these shortcuts throug: You can customize these shortcuts through System Settings → Keyboard → Shortcuts → Windows.
You can also configure &quot;hot corners: You can also configure "hot corners" (shortcuts activated by placing your cursor in the corner of the display) to activate multi-tasking functions like the window overview, workspace overview, and more.
You can customize hot corners through <s: You can customize hot corners through System Settings → Desktop → Hot Corners.
By default, all app windows open on one: By default, all app windows open on one workspace. However, you can use multiple workspaces to organize your workflow:
To see an overview of your workspaces, p: To see an overview of your workspaces, press <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>S</kbd>
To quickly move left or right through yo: To quickly move left or right through your workspaces, press <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>←</kbd> or <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>→</kbd>
To cycle through your workspaces, press: To cycle through your workspaces, press <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>Tab</kbd>
You can jump straight to a specific work: You can jump straight to a specific workspace by pressing <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>1</kbd> through <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>9</kbd>. You can always jump to a new workspace with <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>0</kbd>.
You can also drag app windows between wo: You can also drag app windows between workspaces by dragging their icons in the workspace overview. To see an overview of app windows across all workspaces, press <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>A</kbd>.
You can customize these shortcuts throug: You can customize these shortcuts through System Settings → Keyboard → Shortcuts → Workspaces.
refers to the &quot;super&quot; key. It: refers to the "super" key. It is also known as the "Windows" key on most PCs or the "Command" key on Macs.
elementary OS comes bundled with <strong: elementary OS comes bundled with Software Center, an app store for free and paid apps. Installing a new app from Software Center is easy:
Search in the top-right, or browse.
Click <strong>Install</strong> next to t: Click Install next to the app you want to install.
You may be asked for your password prior: You may be asked for your password prior to installing an app.
Note: Some software may not be available: Note: Some software may not be available from the Software Center. While we don't recommend downloading software from the general Internet, apps that are compatible with Ubuntu 14.04 LTS should work just as well on elementary OS Freya.
elementary comes with a handy app called: elementary comes with a handy app called "System Settings" that controls all of your system-wide (or "global") preferences. System Settings gives you the ability to adjust things like keyboard shortcuts, display resolution, your wallpaper, and more.
You can quickly find settings you are lo: You can quickly find settings you are looking for by typing keywords in the search bar at the top of the window. The contents of the System Settings window will filter down to match your search.
Keep in mind that System Settings only d: Keep in mind that System Settings only deals with the global preferences for elementary. Although, some apps may also have their own preferences, you will not find them here. Instead, look for them inside the app in question.
